title: Samy Bengio - Apple | LinkedIn

title: Samy Bengio on LinkedIn: AI/ML - Machine Learning Researcher, MLR - Careers at Apple
snippet: The MLR team at Apple, recently started by Samy Bengio, is hiring world-class Research Scientists and Software Engineers.

title: Apple hires ex-Google AI scientist who resigned after colleagues' firings | Reuters
snippet: Apple Inc (AAPL.O) said on Monday it has hired former distinguished Google (GOOGL.O) scientist Samy Bengio, who left the search giant amid turmoil in its artificial intelligence research department.

title: Apple hires ex-Google AI expert Samy Bengio | AppleInsider
snippet: Apple has hired Samy Bengio, a former AI scientist who resigned in protest of Google's firing of two employees, to lead a new AI team under John Giannandrea.

title: r/apple on Reddit: Apple has hired Samy Bengio, a former AI scientist who resigned in protest of Google's firing of two employees, to lead a new AI team under John Giannandrea.
snippet: The reasoning for firing her isn't exclusive to google. Apple would have sacked her themselves as well with less fanfare. Companies HR and PR are there to protect themselves employees come in third. 1) Profit 2) Company 3) Employees. ... I hope Apple is woke enough for Samy.
